meanings.definition: A person who works in a steel mill.
meanings.sent1: The steelworkers operated the heavy machinery in the mill.
meanings.sent2: Steelworkers wear protective gear to stay safe at work.
meanings.sent3: The steelworkers joked about turning into human magnets from being around so much metal.
meanings.sent4: The steelworkers were the backbone of the mill, keeping it running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The clang of metal echoed through the mill as the steelworkers worked diligently.

meanings.definition: The group of workers employed in the steel industry.
meanings.sent1: Steelworkers across the country went on strike for better wages.
meanings.sent2: The steelworkers union negotiated for improved working conditions.
meanings.sent3: The steelworkers celebrated reaching a new production record with a barbecue.
meanings.sent4: The steelworkers formed a strong bond through their shared experiences in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The steelworkers' dedication to their craft was evident in the quality of their work.
